channel.title: Client Closing Problem
channel.description:
Ok so the source and the client are pkplanet. I can do everything fine on the server, but i added something and i wanted my friend to test it with me. he has played other servers before so dont say he doesnt have java or something. Any npc he clicks or if he teles his client closes itself. So whats wrong?
Also when you login it says click here to play with some other stuff so how would i change that because it isnt the spot of the interfaces and stuff.

item.title: Client Closing Problem
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

No its not the code because i removed the code just to see and it still dced him so idk

Read full topic

item.description:
@cafoozle wrote:

Check the cod eof what you added. It could have something to do with it. I can’t really help you if I don’t know what you added.
